title: Safari Animal Print Steering Wheel Cover and Shoulder Belt Pads - Hot Pink Zebra
features: Universal fit steering wheel cover and seat belt shoulder pads
Fun and fuzzy zebra pattern fabric
Fits most steering wheels 14.5 to 15.5 inches
Seat belt pads can cushion your shoulder against any strap
description: Chase the dream of having the coolest car interior around by adding this zebra print wheel cover and pair of seat belt covers to your car. Made with anti-fade dye process, the steering wheel cover will look great for years to come. Beneath the velour fabric exterior of the steering wheel cover is insulation that resists extreme temperatures. In the hottest summers and coldest winters, the wheel cover will protect your hands from freezing and burning. The cover is fully lined with PVC to not slip or slide. To install, warm the wheel cover with a hair dryer or in your car on a hot day then slip it over your steering wheel.  With this set of 2 shoulder pads, you will feel the relief of a more comfortable drive, especially during hard turns, stops, and other emergency maneuvers. The foam padding distributes the tension of the belt, resulting in less pressure in one spot. The synthetic polyester cover has long-lasting softness that relieves the harsh rubbing and chafing of nylon seat belts. Pads can also be used on other shoulder straps to make laptop cases, gym bags, and heavy luggage easier to carry. Whether you are buying this auto interior set for yourself, a friend or family member, or your favorite safari print enthusiast, these soft zebra fabric auto accessories will add customization to the carâ€™s interior and comfort to driving.
